mapper.select: select * from task where pid=#{pid} and tid in (select tid from assignee)
select * from task where pid=#{pid} and tid not in (select tid from assignee)
select t.*, s.tstatus, s.color from task t join tstatus s on t.tstatusid = s.tstatusid where tid in (select tid from taskinstep where sid= #{sid}) order by t.ctime
mapper.update: update task set tname=#{tname}, sday=TO_DATE(#{sday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), eday=TO_DATE(#{eday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), detail=#{detail}, importance=#{importance}, tstatusid=#{tstatusid}, ctime=sysdate where tid= #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert INTO task(tid, tname, tstatusid, pid, ctime) values(seq_tid.nextval, tname=#{tname}, tstatusid=#{tstatusid}, pid=#{pid}, sysdate)
